snippet: Ariel Castro, the Cleveland man sentenced to life in prison for holding three women captive, said he called the mother of one of them, according to interrogation videotapes.
abstract: Interrogation videotapes show Ariel Castro, Cleveland man sentenced to life in prison for holding three women captive in his home, said he called the mother of Amanda Berry and told the woman her daughter was alive and had become his wife.
lead_paragraph: Ariel Castro, the Cleveland man sentenced to life in prison for holding three women captive, said he called the mother of one of them, according to interrogation videotapes.

headline.main: Ohio: Kidnapper Told Police They Missed Chances
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Kidnapper Told Police They Missed Chances
